By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 07 Illuminate 5 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
Disc 08 Trace 6 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's Ability.
Disc 11 Ball Fetch 1 If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the first failed thrown Poké Ball.
Disc 15 Lightning Rod 7 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Electric-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
Disc 31 Technician 8 Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
Disc 48 Oblivious 3 The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or taunted.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Aerilate 8 Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Analytic 6 Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
Arctic Surge 9 Turns the ground into Arctic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Arid Surge 9 Turns the ground into Arid Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Bad Dreams 5 Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.
Blustery Surge 9 Turns the ground into Blustery Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Calcifate 8 Normal-type moves become Rock-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Calderize 8 Normal-type moves become Fire-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Carbonize 8 Normal-type moves become Steel-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Cognizate 8 Normal-type moves become Psychic-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Color Change 2 The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.
Combat Surge 9 Turns the ground into Combat Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Combatize 8 Normal-type moves become Fighting-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Contrary 12 Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Distillize 8 Normal-type moves become Water-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Eerie Surge 9 Turns the ground into Eerie Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Electric Surge 9 Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Emergency Exit 4 The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
Flood Surge 9 Turns the ground into Flooded Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Floral Surge 9 Turns the ground into Floral Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Friend Guard 2 Reduces damage done to allies.
Fumigate 8 Normal-type moves become Poison-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Galvanize 8 Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Gooey 6 Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
Grassy Surge 9 Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Hive Mind 8 Normal-type moves become Bug-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Immoralize 8 Normal-type moves become Dark-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Libero 8 Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use.
Magic Bounce 11 Reflects status moves instead of getting hit by them.
Magic Guard 12 The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
Magma Surge 9 Turns the ground into Magma Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Misty Surge 9 Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Moody 10 Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.
Morbid Surge 9 Turns the ground into Morbid Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Muddy Surge 9 Turns the ground into Muddy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Neutralizing Gas 10 When in the battle, the effects of all Pokémon's Abilities will be nullified.
Normalize 8 All the Pokémon's moves become Normal type. Their power is boosted a little.
Noxious Surge 9 Turns the ground into Noxious Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
Pixilate 8 Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Prankster 8 Gives priority to the Pokémon's status moves.
Primal Surge 9 Turns the ground into Primal Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Primalize 8 Normal-type moves become Dragon-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Psychic Surge 9 Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Quick Draw 7 Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.
Rattled 4 Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.
Refrigerate 8 Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Screen Cleaner 4 Entering a battle nullifies the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.
Shrapnel Surge 9 Turns the ground into Shrapnel Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Simple 8 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Terralate 8 Normal-type moves become Ground-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Terrorize 8 Normal-type moves become Ghost-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Unaware 7 When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target Pokémon's stat changes.

  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
